AUI.caption: RPC URL
AUI.doc: Provide a RPC url  for the network this NFT smart contracts deployed on. Mainnet example: https://main-light.eth.linkpool.io
AUI.name: default_provider

AUJ.caption: To Address
AUJ.doc: The address that will receive the tokens.
AUJ.name: to_address

AUK.caption: Amount
AUK.doc: The amount of the token being sent. 1 = 1 ETH.
AUK.name: amount
